channel.title: [317-Delta] Teleport tabs

item.title: [317-Delta] Teleport tabs
item.dc:creator: @MyNameIsDylan MyNameIsDylan
item.description:
@MyNameIsDylan wrote:

I must be trying to add method’s in the incorrect spot. Here’s the problem. I add method’s into the Wear ID packet (case 41)… Something like this,

if (wearID == 2963) { // Ardougne blahblahblah(): // MY CODE HERE }

OK… Now, I can get the code to work the way I would like it to, for the teleport tab’s. The only problem is well, it’s a custom item, and when I click the ‘Break’ option to activate the teleport, I equip the item. Obviously I’m not supposed to. I’ve tried to add it in potions.java… and make the code in the case 41 packet this,

if (wearID == 2963) { return false; }

When I do that, I no longer equip the item, but it can’t read the code anymore because the call isn’t there to recognize the method. I tried adding the call and keeping the return in there, and it won’t recognize the call. How do I fix this?

Read full topic
